description: This plugin offers some basic Google Drive API connections for your application. This plugin is not stand-alone and requires use with a service account (a free service account plugin is available here: https://bubble.io/plugin/google-service-account-1605833704975x195806677045870600).
name: Google Drive API
plugin_instructions:
Prerequisite
A.) You must have a service account ready and enabled. See this plugin: https://bubble.io/plugin/google-service-account-1605833704975x195806677045870600. You may be able to use a token from OAuth, but this plugin was only tested with service accounts.
